room_title: Escape room "Detention" by Key Quest in Nashville
room_address: 166 2nd Avenue North, In the District, Nashville TN, 37201
room_description:
Attention Students! Attention Students!
You have been sent to detention for being the class clown.
You have 45 minutes to reflect on your actions.

You CAN EITHER SERVE YOUR 45 MINUTE DETENTION OR... 
Prove that you have been listening in class by solving a series of puzzles to get out of detention early.

YOUR GOAL IS TO FIND THE HALL PASS. GOOD LUCK!
